definition.core: Represents how the individual experiences, interprets, expresses, and regulates emotional states. Determines reactivity, emotional bandwidth, resilience, and default regulation strategies.

axes.high_reactivity: Emotions intensify quickly; responses are rapid and strong.
axes.low_reactivity: Emotional responses build slowly; intensity is lower by default.
axes.internalizer: Processes emotions inwardly; may suppress, overthink, or privately regulate.
axes.externalizer: Expresses emotions outwardly; may discharge feelings through action, speech, or social contact.

behavioral_markers: speed and intensity of emotional shifts
patterns of coping, soothing, or escalation
